In this magic world there is four kingdoms: The Summer, The Winter, The Autumn and The Spring, and those control the balance of the seasons on Earth.
One day the famous Necromancer called Robson, who controls the change of seasons, was looking for his stilled Necrobook. He travels into the time and accidentally fall in a trap endded up staying stuck in the season of spring causing a desorder in the natural order of this universe.
Now robson needs to recover his Necrobook while trying to find a way out to escape season of Spring and restore the natural balance of the seasons, because if the book stays in wrong hands any longer it will be used for the evil and the peace of the kingdoms will be destroyed.
Your mission is to help Robson to restore the peace of the seasons and recover his book, and this isn´t going to be an easy mission, you will need to fight with a lot of monsters while trying to dicover who stilled the book. Are you ready?

✦ You only can have five characters.
